name: Rubber Ball Runaway
description:
Rubber Ball Runaway

You're a red rubber ball that escaped from suburban life to go on an adventure! Explore 3 levels of 2D platforming fun while you avoid getting popped, collect coins and find secret areas!

This is my first game, a prototype of a game idea I had that made to learn how to make games. If people like it I might finish it and release the full game
